title: Exiles
description: The plot thickens as the hunt for Consul Veris continues, and an old war hero faces his dilemmas about who he has become since the wars, seeking comfort in the old Ungoran town of Crevail. The Senate begins to enact its plans, and in the north, King Kedor is faced with having to deal with an old foe. As the warped storms sustain their vengeance on the human lands, all the while covering more ground, the misfortunes of the beautiful Nadorian Empire begin to come into full view before every inhabitant s waking eyes.
author: Vincent Hobbes
